price: 64. Ya soló, wana ekozala kosuana ya bato ya moto.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
